greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of Hankel transforms of certain binomial sums.
comment: Row k is the Hankel transform of sum{j=0..n, C(k+j, j)}. Absolute value is reversal of A103905. Diagonal and sub-diagonals are essentially signed versions of the central coefficients of certain generalized Pascal-Narayana triangles (A007318, A001263, A056939, A056940, A056941).
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jun 13 2006
